Title.evidence: BEST-CLI is an NIH-sponsored multi-center randomized controlled trial comparing revascularization strategies in CLTI patients.

Trial_Design.evidence: BEST-CLI is an NIH-sponsored multi-center randomized controlled trial comparing revascularization strategies in CLTI patients.

Participants.evidence: patients with CLTI at the time of their enrollment into the trial.

Objective.evidence: We evaluated the utilization of guideline-based OMT among patients with CLTI at the time of their enrollment into the trial.

Number_Randomised.evidence: At time of randomization (n=1830 total enrolled)

Result_Outcome.evidence: Only 25% of patients met all 4 OMT criteria; 38% met 3, 24% met 2, 11% met only 1 and 2% met none.

Funding.evidence: BEST-CLI is an NIH-sponsored multi-center randomized controlled trial
